OutstationConfiguration.SetSessionConfigAspectEnableSelfAddress (METH)
OutstationConfiguration.SetSessionConfigAspectEnableSelfAddress (METH)
Â¶
METHOD SetSessionConfigAspectEnableSelfAddress :
Error
Set optional outstation session configuration aspect - enable self-address.
InOut:
Scope
Name
Type
Initial
Comment
Return
SetSessionConfigAspectEnableSelfAddress
Error
Input
enableSelfAddress
BOOL
FALSE
Specify whether or not to enable self address functionality on this
this Outstation device as specified by DNP Technical Bulletin 2003-003
Self-Address Reservation. Outstation will respond to address 0xfffc as
though it received a request for its configured address. It will
respond with its own address so the master can automatically
discover the Outstation address

rows.Name: enableSelfAddress
rows.Comment:
Specify whether or not to enable self address functionality on this
this Outstation device as specified by DNP Technical Bulletin 2003-003
Self-Address Reservation. Outstation will respond to address 0xfffc as
though it received a request for its configured address. It will
respond with its own address so the master can automatically
discover the Outstation address
